alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Franklin; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 6:50AM CDT until March 30 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Wood County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Morris County in northeastern Texas... Titus County in northeastern Texas... Camp County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 649 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Vernon to 6 miles northeast of Hainesville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Mount Vernon, Daingerfield, Naples, Omaha, Cason, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Cookville, Scroggins, Rocky Branch, Wilkerson, Newsome, Purley, Dalby Springs, Winfield, Talco and Miller`s Cove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bowie; Camp; Franklin; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur; Wood
